data.title: Judy Garland

data.text:
Biography

Judy Garland was born in Grand Rapids, MN on June 10, 1922. Movie icon who played Dorothy in The Wizard of Oz and became the youngest winner of the Cecil B. DeMille Award for lifetime achievement at the age of 39. She was nominated for Academy Awards for her roles in the films A Star is Born and Judgment at Nuremberg. In 1969, at the age of 47, she died of a drug overdose. She starred in the 1954 musical film A Star is Born with James Mason. She began performing vaudeville at the age of two and a half.

On Popular Bio, She is one of the successful Movie Actress. She has ranked on the list of those famous people who were born on June 10, 1922. She is one of the Richest Movie Actress who was born in MN. She also has a position among the list of Most popular Movie Actress.
